title: Character Creation
content: ld. Serious players can take a look at all the stats affected by the changes in each aspect after every step of the creation process. Players can also consider what their playstyle or combat style is when undergoing each step. To break it down, players can choose which parts they want to prioritize whether there is a particular Race, Background, or Class they want to play.
